hero.title: Enterprise Risk Management Reimagined with AI
hero.description: Automate vendor assessments with cutting-edge AI. Monitor risks continuously, maintain compliance, and protect your supply chain with intelligent, autonomous insights.

features.title: Powerful Features for Enterprise Risk Management
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage third-party risks effectively

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Intelligence
aiPowered.description: Accelerate due diligence with AI-driven research, assessments, and reporting.

smartAssessments.title: Adaptive Smart Assessments
smartAssessments.description: Leverage dynamic questionnaires that automatically adjust based on responses.

riskLifecycle.title: Risk Lifecycle Management
riskLifecycle.description: Identify, evaluate, treat, and monitor every risk with automated workflows.

taskManagement.title: Automated Task Management
taskManagement.description: Turn risk findings into action with auto-assigned remediation tasks, team ownership, and real-time implementation status tracking.

supplierIntelligence.title: 360° Supplier Intelligence
supplierIntelligence.description: Get a comprehensive view of any supplier—from risk history to security documentation—powered by automated AI researchs.

securityMonitoring.title: Continuous Security Monitoring
securityMonitoring.description: Monitor supplier security posture 24/7 with ongoing scans, alerts, and trend visibility to track improvements over time.

smartAssessments.title: Smart Assessments
smartAssessments.description: Send standard or smart questionnaires to vendors and automatically generate risk findings from their responses.

jino360.title: AI JINO360 Scan
jino360.description: Enter a supplier URL and instantly generate a full risk profile with AI-driven research, history, and context.

jinoXtreme.title: AI JINO Xtreme Analysis
jinoXtreme.description: Automatically analyze published security documentation to produce full posture assessment —without manual review.

jinoQA.title: AI JINO Q&A Docs
jinoQA.description: Upload files or questionnaires and let AI extract, assess, and score security risks directly from supplied documents.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your organization's needs

testimonials.title: What Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join hundreds of enterprises trusting TPRM

sarah.quote: CHECKFIRST AI approach reduced our vendor assessment time by 80% and helped us achieve our compliance audits. The platform is intuitive and the support team is outstanding.
sarah.author: Sarah Chen

michael.quote: We were managing TPRM manually with spreadsheets. CHECKFIRST platform gave us visibility and control into all our third-party risks and remediation controls implementations. Best investment we made.
michael.author: Michael Roberts

jennifer.quote: The Smart Questionnaire feature helped us build an intelligent and unified process that can adapt and cover complex cases with one Smart Assessment and reduce our SLA by at least 50%.
jennifer.author: Jennifer Parker
